Articles.Content:
Hello! I'm looking to get into modding, KSP2 obviously. I have a bit of experience with coding, but not as much with C# or Unity, but I'm confident I can learn more if I need to. How do I start? Are there any good tutorials, or should I just wing it?

 

Thanks!

- Phofers
I would definitely recommend joining us in the KSP2 Modding Society Discord server, it's where nearly all modders for KSP2 are!
Will do when I get home, thanks!
